Merge pull request #129 from mattdee123/pcall-fix

Fix A Bug With PCall

Fix A Bug With PCall

PCall failed to reset the callstack after a failure, which lead to
errors if someone tried to do certain operations (another function call,
return an error, call Get()) within the same function.

Merge pull request #60 from cathalgarvey/master

Implemented OpenXXX LGFunctions for each built-in module, refactored LState.OpenLibs. Close #55
Using constants for module names. Fixed bad typecast in stringlib.go.

More fixes towards #55, #60.

New private type, luaLib, to contain name and load function, same
idea as Lua5.1's luaL_Reg: http://pgl.yoyo.org/luai/i/luaL_Reg

luaLibs is now private, is now a slice of luaLibs.

Each module register function now returns the module table.

luaLibs are now executed by pushing onto the stack, pushing
the module name, and calling with args 1 and returns 0.

Some comments removed by request.
Updating readme with example. Should be ready to PR for issue #55.
All openers are now LGFunction, all tests pass.
Coroutine library seems to work as LGFunction returning 0
Channel, String and Os seem to work as LGFunctions returning 0
Table appears to work as LGFunction returning 0.
Debug appears to work as LGFunction returning 0.
Math appears to work as LGFunction returning 0.
IO appears to load OK as LGFunction returning 0.
Stage set for handling lib-opening refactor for #55

[Experimental] Introduce an indolent tool for inlining simple function calls

Merge pull request #53 from jtolds/master

Allow for optional disabling of library opening
Allow skipping of opening all libraries by default

[Experimental] Add an original bulk mem allocator

`runtime.convT2I` is called to convert builtin types(e.g.
float64) into interface types(e.g. LValue).
`runtime.convT2I` calls `newobject` to allocate heap for
'isDirectIface(v) == false' types(e.g. float64).
To reduce frequent `newobject` call, I have added a original memory
allocator experimentally.
This allocator has some operations that are regarded as 'danger'
operations including pointer calculations.
It seems that this allocator does not cause memory leaks.
Add a -p flag to generate cpu profiles

Improve the VM performance(Go1.5)

To reduce `runtime.assertI2T2` costs, implement `LValue#assertFloat64`
and `LValue#assertString` and use these functions in the VM.

Merge pull request #14 from bontibon/table-delete-fix

fix table not deleting dict values

fix table not deleting dict values

When LNil is used as the value in a table assignment, it should delete
the key, rather than storing it in the table. Doing the latter can cause
huge amounts of memory to be wasted.
